<style>

* {box-sizing:border-box}

/* Slideshow container */
.slideshow-container {
  position: relative;
  margin: auto;
  /* height: 700px; */
}

/* Hide the images by default */
.mySlides {
  display: none;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: center center;
  background-size: cover;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  min-height: 700px;
}

/* Next & previous buttons */
.prev, .next {
  cursor: pointer;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  width: auto;
  margin-top: -22px;
  padding: 16px;
  color: white;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 18px;
  transition: 0.6s ease;
  border-radius: 0 3px 3px 0;
  user-select: none;
}

/* Position the "next button" to the right */
.next {
  right: 0;
  border-radius: 3px 0 0 3px;
}

/* On hover, add a black background color with a little bit see-through */
.prev:hover, .next:hover {
  background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
}

/* Caption text */
.text {
  color: #f2f2f2;
  font-size: 23px;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 35%;
  width: 100%;
  text-align: center;
}

/* Number text (1/3 etc) */
.numbertext {
  color: #f2f2f2;
  font-size: 12px;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
}

/* The dots/bullets/indicators */
.dot {
  cursor: pointer;
  height: 15px;
  width: 15px;
  margin: 0 5px;
  background-color: #bbb;
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: background-color 0.6s ease;
}
.dot-group {
  position: absolute;
  top: 95%;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: center;
}

.active, .dot:hover {
  background-color: #717171;
}

/* Fading animation */
.fade {
  -webkit-animation-name: fade;
  -webkit-animation-duration: 1.5s;
  animation-name: fade;
  animation-duration: 1.5s;
}

@-webkit-keyframes fade {
  from {opacity: .4}
  to {opacity: 1}
}
@keyframes fade {
  from {opacity: .4}
  to {opacity: 1}
}

About us

Smart Codee is Software and Web Development company base in Montreal, we specialize in software application and tailored developments which not only provide SaaS solution but also provide customize solution to bring your business and software to next level.

Free evaluation existing software to reduce costs and efforts

That's right, unfortunately, most of software development companies claim they provide standard solution for you, however; they always start from scratch that made most of your existing software throw to trash. Proudly, we will do free evaluation of your existing software (doesn't matter which language it is, as long as it's still usable) and provide the most reasonable solution to make use of your existing software that compatible with our SaaS solution.

Agile development to get feedback fast and adjust to right direction

Normally, you would find the companies you worked spending long time to finish the product but it's far away from what you want. Why this happened? it's because when development company working on your product they don't give enough time for you to give feedback on each stage instead they assume this is what you need. In contrast, we follow agile development methodology that will plan with you and give you demo every 2 weeks to make sure we are in the same page to avoid time wasting

Turn your idea to business

Most of time, you will find yourself having a lot of brilliant ideas but having so many steps to turn it to business. Our SaaS solution is including a lot of existing (CMS, CRM, Shopping-cart, PLM, etc) features that will help you to build your foundation fast and achieve to actual idea faster. We also would love to work on the idea and turn it to our SaaS platform.

Big range of service and region

s a web development company, we also offer a big range of other services listed below, not only Canada but also all over the world.
